thread.section_title: Club Quarters Hotel, World Trade Center - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect
thread.title_full: Perfect - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, World Trade Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ceri M
title: Perfect
text: Lovely hotel - we booked a queen room (the smallest I think) and had plenty of space and a comfortable bed. We were on the 4th floor and slept well every night with no noise. The bathroom was a good size too and the whole room was clean and well maintained. We had a coffee machine in our room and there are water machines with empty bottles on each floor. There are also complimentary refreshments on the ground floor - tea, coffee, soft drinks, nuts, fresh fruit. We were close to the subway and the 9/11 museum/memorial. Also close to a great pub called O'Hara's which is worth a visit. No complaints whatsoever and would happily stay here again!
